    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<User> findAll()
        Get all users in the user table
        Returns:
        The List of Users from the UserRepository method findAll

      • authenticate

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                                                               java.lang.String password)
        Login method
        Parameters:
        username - The inputed string corresponding to the username
        password - The inputed string corresponding to the password
        Returns:
        Response Entity containing message if username and/or password are incorrect. If username is null returns the message "Username cannot be empty". If the password is null returns the message "Password cannot be empty". If the username is invalid returns the message "User does not exist". If the user is banned returns the message "You are banned". If the password is incorrect returns "Incorrect Password". Otherwise returns the User object.

      • createUser

        public java.lang.String createUser(User user)
        Creates a new user and saves them to the database
        Parameters:
        user - A user object containing at least the username and password, and possible the first and/or last name of the new user
        Returns:
        If the user object is null returns "User cannot be null". If the username of the user object is null returns "Username cannot be null". If the password of the user object is null returns "Password cannot be null". If the password does not meet the password requirements returns "Password must be 8 characters or longer Password must contain at least one uppercase Password must contain at least one lowercase level". If the username is the save as the username of another user returns "Username taken". Otherwise returns "User {username} created".

      • addFriend

        public java.lang.String addFriend(int userId,
                                  int friendId)
        Add user to friends list
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user who is adding the friend
        friendId - The id of the user who is being added as a friend
        Returns:
        If the users are already friends returns "You are already friends with this user". Otherwise returns "Friend {friend's username} added".

      • removeFriend

        public java.lang.String removeFriend(int userId,
                                     int friendId)
        Remove friend from friends list
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user who is removing the friend
        friendId - The id of the user who is being removed as a friend
        Returns:
        If the users are not friends returns "You are not friends with this user". Otherwise returns "Friend {friend's username} removed".

      • friendsSearch

        public java.util.List<User> friendsSearch(java.lang.String index)
        Gets user with similar information to a search index
        Parameters:
        index - The inputed search term
        Returns:
        List of Users returned by the UserRepository method friendsSearch

      • findById

        public User findById(int id)
        Returns the user with the provided id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the expected user
        Returns:
        The User from the UserRepository method findById

      • deleteUser

        public java.lang.String deleteUser(int id)
        Deletes a user from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user to be deleted
        Returns:
        If the id is not a valid user id, returns "User with id {id} not found". Otherwise returns "User {username} deleted".

      • editUser

        public java.lang.String editUser(int id,
                                 User modifiedUser)
        Edits a user's details
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user that will be edited
        modifiedUser - The user object containing the new user details
        Returns:
        If the modifiedUser is null return "User cannot be null". If the password does not meet the password requirements returns "Password must be 8 characters or longer Password must contain at least one uppercase Password must contain at least one lowercase level". Otherwise returns "User {username} modified"

      • getCash

        public java.lang.Double getCash(int userId)
        Returns the user's cash
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user whose cash is being requested
        Returns:
        The User's cash

      • banUser

        public java.lang.String banUser(int adminId,
                                int userId,
                                boolean isBanned)
        Bans a user
        Parameters:
        adminId - The id of the admin who is banning a user
        userId - The id of the user who is being banned
        isBanned - Boolean value indicating if the user is being banned or unbanned
        Returns:
        If the user who is trying to ban a user is not an admin returns "You do not have access to these funcitons". Otherwise if isBanned is true returns "User {username} banned". If isBanned is false returns "User {username} unbanned".

      • addAdmin

        public java.lang.String addAdmin(int adminId,
                                 int userId)
        Promote another user to admin
        Parameters:
        adminId - The id of the admin who is a promoting a user
        userId - The id of the user who is being promoted
        Returns:
        If the user who is trying to promote a user is not an admin returns "You do not have access to these functions". If the userId is not a valid user returns "User does not exist". Otherwise returns "User {username} is now an Admin".

      • getFriends

        public java.util.List<User> getFriends(int userId)
        Get the friends of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user whose friends are being requested
        Returns:
        The List of Users that are friends with the user

      • buyStock

        public int buyStock(int userId,
                    double price,
                    int num)
        Decrements the user's bank according to the number of stocks they can purchase.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user buying stocks
        price - The price of the stock
        num - The number of stocks to be purchased
        Returns:
        Number of stocks to be purchased. If the cost of the stocks is greater than the user's cash then the number is decreased to the largest number of stocks that can be bought.

      • sellStock

        public void sellStock(int userId,
                      double price,
                      int num)
        Adds cash to the user's bank after selling stocks
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user selling stocks
        price - The price of the stock
        num - The number of stocks to be purchased

        Returns:
        The id of the user
